      • initialize

        public static void initialize(double cpr,
                              double wheelDiameter,
                              double leftOffset,
                              double rightOffset,
                              double frontBackOffset)
        A method to initialize the static OdometryCore instance
        Parameters:
        cpr - - The counts per rotation for the encoders
        wheelDiameter - - The encoder wheel's diameter (in inches)
        leftOffset - - The left encoder's offset from the center (in inches)
        rightOffset - - The right wheel's offset from the center (in inches)
        frontBackOffset - - The front or back wheel's offset from the center (in inches)

        A method to get the current position using three wheel odometry
        Parameters:
        positions - - The robot's three encoder's positions
        Returns:
        - The Position of the robot with an x, y, and heading
